effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user’s Special Attack by two stages.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user’s Special Attack by two stages.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user’s Special Attack by two stages.

short_effect.sun_moon: Lowers the user’s Special Attack by two stages after inflicting damage.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Lowers the user’s Special Attack by two stages after inflicting damage.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Lowers the user’s Special Attack by two stages after inflicting damage.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user whips up a storm of leaves around the target. The attack’s recoil harshly lowers the user’s Sp. Atk stat.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user whips up a storm of leaves around the target. The attack’s recoil harshly lowers the user’s Sp. Atk stat.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user whips up a storm of leaves around the target. The attack’s recoil harshly lowers the user’s Sp. Atk stat.
